Do you know how the #Cardano #staking works?  1) Tx fees + reward budget are put into a virtual pot. 2) 5% $ADA goes to the treasury and 95% is used for rewarding pools. 3) The protocol proportionally rewards pools. 4) Pool operators are rewarded. 5) Delegators are rewarded.  https://t.co/FusUilZh06
